content.html: Ran into a bona-fide Git bug in the wild today! There's a first. Mostly just highlights how impressive it is that I've used Git almost every working day for a decade without running into any others though... github.com/so-fancy/diff-…
content.value:
Ran into a bona-fide Git bug in the wild today! There's a first.

Mostly just highlights how impressive it is that I've used Git almost every working day for a decade without running into any others though...

github.com/so-fancy/diff-…
